title: Hakainde Hichilema: Zambia's new president inspires African opposition leaders
content:
1. Hakainde Hichilema: Zambia's new president inspires African opposition leaders  BBC News
  2. Zambia's president-elect Hichilema invites Zimbabwe opposition leader Chamisa to his inauguration  SABC News
  3. Zambia's presidential inauguration guest list sends a strong message of solidarity to opposition movements  SABC News
  4. Zambia’s unexpected election result marks a welcome change for Africa  The Globe and Mail
  5. Zambia opposition win inspires Zimbabwe's youths  eNCA
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
